## Checklist

Before submitting, please ensure:

- [ ] I've read the [contribution guidelines](https://github.com/charlieatkinson33/SimWiki/blob/main/contribute.md)
- [ ] My changes are accurate and factual
- [ ] I've included UK supplier information where relevant
- [ ] I've added any necessary safety warnings
- [ ] I've checked for typos and grammar issues
- [ ] Links are working and point to the correct pages
- [ ] Cost information is current and accurate
- [ ] I agree to license my contribution under CC BY-SA 4.0

## Additional Notes

<!-- Anything else reviewers should know? -->


---

**First time contributing?** Welcome! Please don't worry if you're unsure about anything - we're here to help and will guide you through the review process. 

**Questions?** Feel free to ask in the comments below or [start a discussion](https://github.com/charlieatkinson33/SimWiki/discussions).
